title: How does Singapore detect potholes on roads? With AI
description: Artificial intelligence is being used to detect potholes and other road defects in Singapore with over 90 per cent accuracy.
content:
SINGAPORE: Artificial intelligence and video analytics are increasingly being deployed to keep Singapore’s roads free of defects such as potholes, the Land Transport Authority (LTA) said.

title: Goldman CEO Predicts AI May Increase Staff Size Over the Next Decade
description: Many have predicted Wall Street could lose jobs because of artificial intelligence. David Solomon thinks the opposite — here's why.
content:
Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon remembers what life was like before AI, and is all in on using it to expand the ranks of his bank in the next decade.

title: Nvidia Competitor Cerebras Shelves IPO Plans Days After Touching $8 Billion Valuation
description: Artificial intelligence chipmaker Cerebras Systems scrapped plans for an IPO on Friday, days after the Nvidia Corp. (NASDAQ: NVDA) competitor announced a fresh fundraising round that sent its valuation up to $8 billion.
content:

title: Jeff Bezos Calls AI Boom A Bubble - But Says It's A Good One
description: Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) founder Jeff Bezos acknowledged that artificial intelligence is in "a kind of industrial bubble" but stressed that the technology is real and will deliver "gigantic" benefits to society.

title: OpenAI to boost content owners' control for Sora AI video app, plans monetization
description: ChatGPT creator OpenAI will soon introduce controls allowing the owners of content rights to dictate how their characters are used in its AI video-generating tool Sora and plans to share revenue with those who permit such use. The artificial intelligence company will give rights holders "more granular control over generation of characters," Chief Executive Sam Altman posted on his blog on Friday.
content:
